mapper.select: select htbh as "htbh",cqrxm as "cqr",fwzl as "cqzl" from FCJY_CLF_ZJJGHT where htbh like '%${htbhOld}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fcjy_clf_zjjght ( jgid, htbh, hbh, fwzl, fwmj, fwsyqzh, cqrxm, cqrdh, htje, hbzl, jjjgbh, jjjgmc, lybz, txzh, txqlr, bz ) VALUES ( #{jgid}, #{htbh}, #{hbh}, #{fwzl}, #{fwmj}, #{fwsyqzh}, #{cqrxm}, #{cqrdh}, #{htje}, #{hbzl}, #{jjjgbh}, #{jjjgmc}, #{lybz}, #{txzh}, #{txqlr}, #{bz} )
mapper.select: SELECT jgid, htbh, hbh, fwzl, fwmj, fwsyqzh, cqrxm, cqrdh, htje, hbzl, jjjgbh, jjjgmc, lybz, txzh, txqlr, bz FROM fcjy_clf_zjjght where JGID = #{jgid}
